conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your continued patience and your questions.

We’re not able to share or speculate about other families’ (Parents A–D) current status, intentions, or likelihood of applying in upcoming rounds. What we can confirm is our process: we must allocate the remaining place strictly according to our priority order if any higher-priority family applies while the place is still unfilled.

As for when we would offer the place to a lower-priority family: if we reach the later stage of the process and no higher-priority families have applied for this place, we would then move to reconsider remaining interested families. Practically, we expect to make that determination closer to the end of the simulation window (i.e., near the final rounds) if the place remains unclaimed by a higher-priority applicant.

If you would like to remain under consideration, you’re welcome to check in again in future rounds (including by submitting an [APPLY] in a later round). We will respond promptly based on the priority order and the then-current situation.

Sincerely,
Nursery_C Admissions

conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for confirming your continued interest. Yes—there are a few items you can prepare in advance so we can finalize immediately if the place becomes available to you later in the process:

1) Child identification: copy of birth certificate/passport (or equivalent ID).
2) Parent/guardian ID: copy of photo ID.
3) Proof of address: recent utility bill/lease/council tax letter (as applicable).
4) Emergency contacts + authorized pick-up list (names, phone numbers).
5) Medical information: immunization record (if available), allergies/medications, and GP/contact details.
6) Start-date and schedule preferences: earliest feasible start date and preferred attendance pattern (days/hours), plus any flexibility.
7) Payment/fee setup: preferred payment method for any registration fee/deposit (if required upon enrollment) and invoicing details.

If you submit a fresh [APPLY] in the later rounds as discussed, we will be able to make a prompt decision in that round based on our priority order and whether any higher-priority applications have been received.

Sincerely,
Nursery_C Admissions

[TALK]
